entry.title: [DE1][Public Cloud] - Instances incident notification
entry.content:
Feb 27, 18:17 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that we had an incident on our Public Cloud offer in DE1.
This incident has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 27/02/2025 17:14 UTC
End time : 27/02/2025 17:49 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some instances located in DE1 were temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers were temporarily unable to access and use their instances in DE1.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network equipment issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

entry.title: [AMS/MAD][Public Cloud] - Local Zone incident notification
entry.content:
Feb 27, 18:00 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Public Cloud offer.

Here are some supplementary details :
Customers Impact : Customers are not able to create new private network in the local AMS and MAD, but they have no impact on the instances that already exist.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a software issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
